title: Looking for a Green Cobb midgrade
author: Peter_Spaeth

posts.post_title: Looking for a Green Cobb midgrade
posts.post_content: Late to the party and never should have sold mine a few years ago, oh well.  Looking for a strong 4/4.5, reasonable centering need not be "elite," great registration and eye appeal musts.  PSA somewhat preferred.  As usual, I will pay strong but not crazy.  I've seen ebay.  Thanks for looking.
I have a feeling I'll be at this a while.
